mapper.sql: id, name, studentId, icon, phone, birthday, sex, pid, tid, question, answer, addtime, status, grad
mapper.insert: insert into common_student (id, name, studentId, icon, phone, birthday, sex, pid, tid, question, answer, addtime, status, grad) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{question,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{answer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{grad,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update common_student
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
studentId = #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
question = #{question,jdbcType=INTEGER},
answer = #{answer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
grad = #{grad,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update common_student set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studentId = #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, question = #{question,jdbcType=INTEGER}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, grad = #{grad,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name,icon, tid, studentId from common_student where tid = #{tid}
select id, name,icon, tid, studentId from common_student where tid = #{tid} and name like #{name}
